ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: video cards
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i picked up my new video card Sunday and it rocks.  I did get the GeForce4 Ti4200 card.  It has 64 mb RAM.  Even the box says it out performs the 128
ygData.messageBody: Well i picked up my new video card Sunday and it rocks.  I did get the GeForce4 Ti4200 card.  It has 64 mb RAM.  Even the box says it out performs the 128 version of the same card.  The 128 meg Ti 4200 the ram funs at 444 MHrz and the 64 mb card runs at 500.  The cool thing was it only cost me  $184.  well my game plays great now.  I still get a little jerkiness on the Plane of knowledge, even though i have a 1.33 Ghrz with 412 mb RAm and a DSL connection and my clip rate is turned all the way down.  Well See everyone later
